entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:38 AM MDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:38 AM MDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
